alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:33PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 215 PM EDT... At 133 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Homestead General Airport, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Coral Gables, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Kendall, Pinecrest, Florida City, Homestead Base, Naranja, Richmond West, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Leisure City, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, Zoo Miami, Goulds and The Hammocks. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
